title: Pixel 4a 5G Shutting down/Rebooting during phone calls
content:
Pixel 4a 5G bought in Feb 2021.
During Cellular Voice calls it Shuts down or reboots randomly. This happens almost every day for 1 or 2 calls. The screen stops being responsive while the call is On then the phone goes off. 

Phone is fully updated.
Sensors or connections like GPS, WiFi, Bluetooth etc being On/Off doesn't make a difference. Apps running or not running in the background don't make a difference. Charging status doesn't make a difference. Phone temperature feels normal and doesn't feel warm or overheated when this happens.
